mapper.select: SELECT normalized_name FROM author GROUP BY normalized_name
SELECT count(*) FROM author WHERE normalized_name = #{normalizedName} LIMIT 1000
SELECT cast(author_id as CHAR), normalized_coauthor FROM author INNER JOIN author_coauthor USING (author_id) where author.normalized_name = #{normalizedName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO author(first_name, last_name, normalized_name) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{normalizedName});
INSERT INTO author_coauthor(author_id, normalized_coauthor) VALUES (Cast(#{authorID} as Integer),#{normalizedCoauthor});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM author_coauthor WHERE author_id = #{tmpInnerMaxAuthorID}; DELETE FROM author WHERE author_id = #{tmpInnerMaxAuthorID};
